docs.title: Data Preperation stage
docs.text:
• Convert my data into train and test.tsv in 70:30 ratio

data.xml
    |-train.tsv
    |-test.tsv
- We are choosing only three tags in the xml data - 1. row Id , 2. title and body 3. Tags (Stackoverflow tags specific to python)

Tags feature names row Id row ID title and body text stackoverflow tags Label - Python

docs.title: featurization stage
docs.text:
from sklearn.feature_extraction.text import CountVectorizer
corpus = [
"zebra apple ball cat",
"ball cat dog elphant",
"very very unique"
]
vectorizer = CountVectorizer()
X = vectorizer.fit_transform(corpus)
print(X.toarray())
print(vectorizer.get_feature_names_out())
